item.title: Aspose.OMR for Java 22.12 - Release Notes
item.description: This article contains a summary of recent changes, enhancements and bug fixes in Aspose.OMR for Java 22.12 (December 2022) release. What was changed This is the major release of Aspose.OMR for Java which delivers significant new features, enhancements to existing features, performance improvements, and fixes. The list below contains the most important features that are supported in this release: Key Summary Category OMRJAVA-61 Allow adding images to machine-readable forms.
